sentence.text: However, there is limited knowledge on the selenoprotein expression in colorectal adenoma (RNA splicing) and colorectal cancer (CRC) patients, or the interaction with Se status levels.

iGPX2/i and liTXNRD3/i showed a higher expression and liGPX3/i, liselenium compound metabolic process/i, liSELENOS/i, and liSEPHS2/i exhibited a lower expression in the disease tissue from adenomas and both cancer groups (lip/i-values from 0.023 to AAAA0.001).

While there were no significant correlations with both Se status markers, liSELENOF/i, liSELENOK/i, and liTXNRD1/i tumor tissue expression positively correlated with Se, while liTXNRD2/i and liTXNRD3/i negatively correlated with liselenium compound metabolic process/i.
